title: style.css
content: .im-web-slider{ width: 100%; min-width: 520px; height: 400px; position: relative; overflow: hidden; background:#fff; -webkit-transition: background-position 1s ease-out 0.3s; -moz-transition: background-position 1s ease-out 0.3s; -o-transition: background-position 1s ease-out 0.3s; -ms-transition: background-position 1s ease-out 0.3s; transition: background-position 1.4s ease-in-out 0.3s; z-index:3; } .im-web-slide{ position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; top: 0px; left: 0px; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS','Lucida Console',sans-serif; text-align: left; } .bildslider { opacity:0; filter: alpha(opacity=30); } .im-web-slide-current { z-index: 10; } .im-web-slider-fb .im-web-slide { left: 100%; } .im-web-slider-fb .im-web-slide-current { left: 0px; } .im-web-slide h2, .im-web-slide p, .im-web-slide .im-web-link, .im-web-slide .im-web-img{ position: absolute; opacity: 1; left: 110%; } .im-web-slider-fb .im-web-slide h2, .im-web-slider-fb .im-web-slide p, .im-web-slider-fb .im-web-slide .im-web-link{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; z-index:1999; } .im-web-slider-fb .im-web-slide .bildslider { opacity: 0; } .im-web-slider-fb .im-web-slide .im-web-img{ left: 65%; opacity: 1; } .im-web-slide h2{ color: #595959; font-size: 45px; width: 50%; top: 73px; white-space: nowrap; z-index: 10; margin:10px 0 0 0 ; text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); font-family: 'Trebuchet MS','Lucida Console',sans-serif; font-weight: 700; } .im-web-slide p{ color: #595959; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS','Lucida Console',sans-serif; font-size: 12px; height: 80px; line-height: 18px; overflow: hidden; top: 155px; width: 46%; font-weight: normal; } .im-web-slide .im-web-img { background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #F0F0F0; border: 1px solid #C7C7C7; border-radius: 100px 100px 100px 100px; height: 200px; line-height: 200px; text-align: center; top: 99px; width: 200px; } .im-web-slide .im-web-img .icon { font-size:120px; color: #8d8c8c; text-shadow: 3px 3px 1px #595959; } .im-web-slide .im-web-img .star-klein { font-size:53px!important; letter-spacing: -10px; text-shadow: 2px 2px 1px #595959; } .im-web-slide .im-web-link{ top: 270px; /*depends on p height*/ background: url("../../..img/icon-buttonnormal.png") no-repeat scroll 4px 4px #f6f6f6; border: 1px solid #DBDBDB; border-radius: 23px 23px 23px 23px; color: #595959; font-size: 11px; font-weight:bold; height: 23px; line-height: 22px; overflow: hidden; padding: 1px 12px 1px 25px; text-decoration: none; } .im-web-slide .im-web-link:hover{ background: url("../../..img/icon-buttonnormal.png") no-repeat scroll 4px 4px #FFFFFF; color:#595959; } .im-web-dots{ width: 100%; position: absolute; text-align: center; left: 0px; bottom: 20px; z-index: 2000; -moz-user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none; } .im-web-dots span{ display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12px; height: 12px; border-radius: 50%; background: #22588d; margin: 3px; cursor: pointer; box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.1) inset, 1px 1px 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.1); } .im-web-dots span.im-web-dots-current:after{ content: ''; width: 8px; height: 8px; position: absolute; top: 2px; left: 2px; border-radius: 50%; background: rgb(255,255,255); background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(246,246,246,1) 47%, rgba(237,237,237,1) 100%); background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,rgba(255,255,255,1)), color-stop(47%,rgba(246,246,246,1)), color-stop(100%,rgba(237,237,237,1))); background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%,rgba(246,246,246,1) 47%,rgba(237,237,237,1) 100%); background: -o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%,rgba(246,246,246,1) 47%,rgba(237,237,237,1) 100%); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%,rgba(246,246,246,1) 47%,rgba(237,237,237,1) 100%); background: linear-gradient(top, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%,rgba(246,246,246,1) 47%,rgba(237,237,237,1) 100%); filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#ffffff', endColorstr='#ededed',GradientType=0 ); } .im-web-arrows{ -moz-user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none; } .im-web-arrows span{ position: absolute; top: 185px; height: 30px; width: 30px; border-radius: 50%; background: #25588d; cursor: pointer; z-index: 2000; opacity: 1; box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.1) inset, 1px 1px 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.1); -webkit-transition: opacity 0.4s ease-in-out 0.2s; -moz-transition: opacity 0.4s ease-in-out 0.2s; -o-transition: opacity 0.4s ease-in-out 0.2s; -ms-transition: opacity 0.4s ease-in-out 0.2s; transition: opacity 0.4s ease-in-out 0.2s; } .im-web-slider:hover .im-web-arrows span{ opacity: 1; } .im-web-arrows span:after{ content: ''; position: absolute; width: 20px; height: 20px; top: 5px; left: 5px; background: transparent url(../images/arrows.png) no-repeat top left; border-radius: 50%; box-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } .im-web-arrows span:hover:after{ box-shadow: 1px 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); } .im-web-arrows span:active:after{ box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.1); } .im-web-arrows span.im-web-arrows-next:after{ background-position: top right; } .im-web-arrows span.im-web-arrows-prev{ left: 15px; } .im-web-arrows span.im-web-arrows-next{ right: 15px; } .im-web-slide-current h2, .im-web-slide-current p, .im-web-slide-current .im-web-link { left: 10%; opacity: 1; z-index: 2000; } .im-web-slide-current .bildslider { opacity: 0.3; } .im-web-slide-current .im-web-img{ left: 65%; opacity: 1; z-index: 2000; } /* Animation classes and animations */ /* Slide in from the right*/ .im-web-slide-fromright h2{ -webkit-animation: fromRightAnim1 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; -moz-animation: fromRightAnim1 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; -o-animation: fromRightAnim1 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; -ms-animation: fromRightAnim1 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; animation: fromRightAnim1 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; } .im-web-slide-fromright p{ -webkit-animation: fromRightAnim2 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; -moz-animation: fromRightAnim2 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; -o-animation: fromRightAnim2 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; -ms-animation: fromRightAnim2 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; animation: fromRightAnim2 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; } .im-web-slide-fromright .im-web-link{ -webkit-animation: fromRightAnim3 0.4s ease-in 1.2s both; -moz-animation: fromRightAnim3 0.4s ease-in 1.2s both; -o-animation: fromRightAnim3 0.4s ease-in 1.2s both; -ms-animation: fromRightAnim3 0.4s ease-in 1.2s both; animation: fromRightAnim3 0.4s ease-in 1.2s both; } .im-web-slide-fromright .im-web-img{ -webkit-animation: fromRightAnim4 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; -moz-animation: fromRightAnim4 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; -o-animation: fromRightAnim4 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; -ms-animation: fromRightAnim4 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; animation: fromRightAnim4 0.6s ease-in 0.8s both; } @-webkit-keyframes fromRightAnim1{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-webkit-keyframes fromRightAnim2{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-webkit-keyframes fromRightAnim3{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 1%{ left: 10%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-webkit-keyframes fromRightAnim4{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 65%; opacity: 1; } } @-moz-keyframes fromRightAnim1{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-moz-keyframes fromRightAnim2{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-moz-keyframes fromRightAnim3{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 1%{ left: 10%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-moz-keyframes fromRightAnim4{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 65%; opacity: 1; } } @-o-keyframes fromRightAnim1{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-o-keyframes fromRightAnim2{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-o-keyframes fromRightAnim3{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 1%{ left: 10%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-o-keyframes fromRightAnim4{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 65%; opacity: 1; } } @-ms-keyframes fromRightAnim1{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-ms-keyframes fromRightAnim2{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-ms-keyframes fromRightAnim3{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 1%{ left: 10%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @-ms-keyframes fromRightAnim4{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 65%; opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fromRightAnim1{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fromRightAnim2{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fromRightAnim3{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 1%{ left: 10%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 10%; opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fromRightAnim4{ 0%{ left: 110%; opacity: 0; } 100%{ left: 65%; opacity: 1; } } /* Slide in from the left*/ .im-web-slide-fromleft h2{ -webkit-animation: fromLeftAnim1 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; -moz-animation: fromLeftAnim1 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; -o-animation: fromLeftAnim1 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; -ms-animation: fromLeftAnim1 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; animation: fromLeftAnim1 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; } .im-web-slide-fromleft p{ -webkit-animation: fromLeftAnim2 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; -moz-animation: fromLeftAnim2 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; -o-animation: fromLeftAnim2 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; -ms-animation: fromLeftAnim2 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; animation: fromLeftAnim2 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; } .im-web-slide-fromleft .im-web-link{ -webkit-animation: fromLeftAnim3 0.4s ease-in 1.2s both; -moz-animation: fromLeftAnim3 0.4s ease-in 1.2s both; -o-animation: fromLeftAnim3 0.4s ease-in 1.2s both; -ms-animation: fromLeftAnim3 0.4s ease-in 1.2s both; animation: fromLeftAnim3 0.4s ease-in 1.2s both; } .im-web-slide-fromleft .im-web-img{ -webkit-animation: fromLeftAnim4 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; -moz-animation: fromLeftAnim4 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; -o-animation: fromLeftAnim4 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; -ms-animation: fromLeftAnim4 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; animation: fromLeftAnim4 0.6s ease-in 0.6s both; } @-webkit-keyframes fromLeftAnim1{ 0%{ left: -110%;
